description.displayText: Zoe was the nanny for my twin 5 year old boys the entire summer of 2013 just after her family moved to Sarasota, Florida. Zoe is AWESOME!!! My boys are extremely energetic and she had no problem keeping them entertained and happy. She is very responsible and I completely trust her in all aspects of care for my boys. As a matter of fact, one of my boys had an accident and had to get stitches and she was able to take him to the doctor, get him treated and care for him afterwards because I own my own business and was unable to leave. She is an excellent driver and routinely took them to outings to the beach, arts & crafts store, the park, movies, etc. They absolutely love her and always look forward to her babysitting them when she's home from college on breaks. I cannot recommend her highly enough - you will not be disappointed by having Zoe care for your kids, regardless of their age!

description.displayText: I met Zoe my freshman year of college at USC after we joined the same sorority. I can honestly say that she is one of my best friends and one of the sweetest, most thoughtful girls I know. Being pre-med, I am often very stressed over school work and Zoe is very supportive and comforting. Every time she goes home with me to visit my family, she ends up playing with my little cousins the entire time and they absolutely love her. I cannot recommend this girl enough! You will love her!

description.displayText: Zoe watched my 3 boys on and off for many years while she was in high school in Memphis. They were ages 9-13 at the time. She was responsible, loving and trustworthy. My boys were so excited every time she came and were sad to see her leave at the end of the night. She is a bright girl and would be able to handle any emergency situation should it arise. I can't say enough about her! Wish she still lived here in Memphis to help!
